title: Zenith'24
description: Zenith'24 is a 3-day event that includes a 24-hour hackathon and workshops focused on building large language models (LLMs). Participants will have the opportunity to learn from experts, collaborate with peers, and develop innovative projects using state-of-the-art AI technologies.

title: Interaction day 2024
description: Interaction Day 2024 was a vibrant event organized by the SCOPE Club, aimed at fostering connections and collaboration among students. The event featured interactive sessions, team-building activities, and insightful talks from industry experts, providing a platform for students to network and share ideas.

title: Webmania 2.0
description: Webmania 2.0 is a 3-day event that includes a workshop on web development, a 24-hour hackathon, and a coding contest. The event is designed to help students learn new skills, build projects, and compete with their peers.

title: Careerzen
description: CareerZen was a two hour session designed to empower members with the knowledge and skills necessary to navigate the complex landscape of career development. The event featured seasoned professionals, industry experts, and career counselors who shared valuable insights, tips, and strategies.

title: SPLASH
description: A 90-minute Campus-level coding competition wherein participants are given a problem set to solve in their preferred programming language and get an opportunity to show up their programming skills.

title: GameHub 2.O
description: Bored of playing the same old games? Have you ever thought of creating your own game? Here is an opportunity to expose your creative skills and simulate all your boundless imagination Scope club is back with another spectacular event GameHub-2.0.A 3-Day-Hackathon which includes Bootcamp, guidance from experts and a cherishing environment for sure.So, what are you waiting for, Awaken your inner developer and create your own game based on limitless themes.

title: Modifest
description: SCOPE Club is back again to provide you an oppurtunity to explore the most popular domains WEB and APP Development with modifest

title: CBUG Contest
description: 7 days Online contest in which Winner will get Amazon Gift Voucher And Some Well participated Participents will get Udemy course

title: Codewars
description: A Coding Contest on Coding Ninjas platform.
